name: Out of Control Lumberjack
description:
Description

You play as a lumberjack trying to cut down all the trees in the area before the raging fire catches up to you.  But sometimes you'll speed up and down outside of your control. Can you cut down all the trees?

How to play

  • Playing with full screen is recommended (blue box with white arrow at the bottom right of game screen)
  • Use WASD to move
  • Hold space to use the axe
  • Run into a tree four times in order to chop it down
  • Try to cut all the trees down before time runs out
  • Watch out for the smoke trying to block your view

Assests used

  • I used the "Free Sound Effects Pack" made by Oliver Girardot

Other Notes

This is my first game jam, so I hope you like what I made! I haven't been programming for long, but I decided to try making a game. I hope it turned out well enough.
